title: Profound Show Open, Things Trump Doesn't Know About Black Women, Aretha Franklin Funeral, VMAs, Viral Video, Lies, 2 Chainz Wedding, Kim K, Weekend Confessions, Show Close and more.
itunes:title: Profound Show Open, Things Trump Doesn't Know About Black Women, Aretha Franklin Funeral, VMAs, Viral Video, Lies, 2 Chainz Wedding, Kim K, Weekend Confessions, Show Close and more.
description:
The CEO opens with a profound conclusion. Things That Trump Doesn't Know About Black Women. Aretha Franklin's funeral services have been announced. The MTV VMAs are going down tonight in NYC. There is a viral video of a doctor trying to prove a point. Giuliani is holding Trump back. The fellas talk about lying. 2 Chainz gets married. Kim K is mentioned and Steve talks about how he looks in photos. Fool #1 brings back Weekend Confessions. J. Anthony Brown has a class reunion story, Steve wishes his twin girls a Happy Birthday and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
